product_name: NYX Professional MakeupFace Freezie Reusable Cooling Undereye Patches
summary: SummarySay hello to NYX Professional Makeup Face Freezie Reusable Cooling Undereye Patches. A cryotherapy inspired under eye mask with tons of icy benefits.
details: DetailsBenefitsLevel up your skincare game with the coolest trend in wellness – NYX Professional Face Freezie Reusable Undereye Patches.Item 2605336How To UsePut the undereye patches in the refrigerator, or clean with cold water, for 20 minutes or more. Tilt your head back and apply the silicone patches to clean skin. Leave on for 5-10 minutes and chill out while they work its icy magic! Wash the patches with light soap and water, towel dry and store them in the sealed bag. Pair with and use after Face Freezie Cooling Primer + Moisturizer for maximum benefits!
how_to_use: Put the undereye patches in the refrigerator, or clean with cold water, for 20 minutes or more. Tilt your head back and apply the silicone patches to clean skin. Leave on for 5-10 minutes and chill out while they work its icy magic! Wash the patches with light soap and water, towel dry and store them in the sealed bag. Pair with and use after Face Freezie Cooling Primer + Moisturizer for maximum benefits!

reviews.headline: Trash.
reviews.comments: This is a major miss for NYX. They are sharp on the edges. They dont stay in place even if you lay down w any sort of product on. And, worst of all, they dont stay cool enough to even do anything. Thank god returns are an option. At this price point, it was worth the extra trip.

reviews.headline: Not practical
reviews.comments: I thought these would maybe be sticky so they would stick under your eyes… nope. So you effectively have to lay down while using these, because they dont stay on if you are upright, which makes them a huge pain. They are also very flat and straight and stiff - but your eye area is rounded. This makes it so they only touch one part of your under eyes(in the middle), if you want your whole under eye area to get the coolness, you have to hold it down. So to use these you have to be laying down and hold down both patches the whole time…. No thanks

reviews.headline: Not worth it. Poor execution
reviews.comments:
Dont fit well and have so much plastic edge material that the poke your eyes. 
Do not stay cold for even 5 min

reviews.headline: Not worth it
reviews.comments: I wantee to love these but they are not worth spending your money on. They do not stay cold for long - maybe 5 minutes. They also dont really sit on your face well.

reviews.headline: They are ok
reviews.comments:
I recommend putting these in the fridge or the freezer. These are great that you can reuse them however, I wish they had a little more gel in them and we're a little more flexible to form the face. I have not tried putting these in the freezer yet, but having them in the fridge provides a nice cool, but it doesn't stay cool for very long. 

But for something very quick and to soothe puffiness in a pinch, it works ok.

reviews.headline: Burned my eyes
reviews.comments: I put these in the freezer because they didn't get very cold in the fridge. They left giant red patches under my eyes. So far it has been twelve hours and my undereyes are still bright red. Yes they depuffed but at what cost?

reviews.headline: Not great
reviews.comments: I bought these patches and within one week They dried out and are not usable anymore.

reviews.headline: Hot Flashes
reviews.comments: These are awesome while you are having hot flashes.

reviews.headline: Pretty pointless
reviews.comments: I really like the concept of these but theyre not worth it. They only stay cool for maybe 2 minutes. Nowhere near enough time to be effective. They have rough edges so theyre unconfortable around your eyes. Theyre not sticky at all so you have to hold them around your eyes while you use them. I got these on sale for a good price but im still annoyed having spent more than $1 on this product

reviews.headline: Waste of money
reviews.comments: They dont stay still and only cool for maybe 2 minutes…. Nice while it lasts though

reviews.headline: Good but not worth it
reviews.comments: Wont stick onto the face so you have to hold them down or lay flat. Also the shape is a little weird

reviews.headline: Short lived and hard to keep put
reviews.comments: In theory, i love a reusable product. These are very small and light weight so they don't stay cold for very long, and curl up from your face reducing skin contact.

reviews.headline: AMAZING
reviews.comments: I got sun poisoning all over my face while on vacation and these came in very handy! My face swelled up and these helped bring it back down! And aside from that they are very soothing.

reviews.headline: Won't stay on
reviews.comments: These won't stay on unless I'm lying flat

reviews.headline: Don't buy
reviews.comments: These do not lay on your face flat. Waste of money. Do not even get that cold in the fridge.

reviews.headline: You can buy these anywhere
reviews.comments: I don't know why I expected this to be any different than any other ice mask. They aren't and even worse because these have no band they don't stay on your face. It's to bad they didn't think of a way for them to stick. Even if I only could use them a few times, they fact they don't stay on your face is a problem. Save yourself money and get a similar product cheaper.

reviews.headline: Not effective
reviews.comments: I could not get the patches to stay put under my eyes and I was laying down as well. The patches also do not stay cool for more than 1 min.

reviews.headline: BFFR
reviews.comments:
Horrible! Dont believe the hype. Doesnt even stick!! Everyone suggested this eye patch.. if doesnt stick to my eyes and its barely cold even with

   cosmetic fridge!! I honestly hate it. Waste of money.. do better

reviews.headline: Would not recommend
reviews.comments: Would not recommend keeps slipping off my face I thought is was sticky on one side. If you lay it on they have a nice cooling effect

reviews.headline: Feels great. Makes you sit very still
reviews.comments: These feel really great on your face after being in the fridge for a little bit. Super soothing, really long lasting cooling effect. The only flyers you have to send very very still to make sure that they stay in place otherwise they fall off. So it does make you take about five minutes just to yourself to be calm, COOL and collected.

faceoff_positive.comments: These feel really great on your face after being in the fridge for a little bit. Super soothing, really long lasting cooling effect. The only flyers you have to send very very still to make sure that they stay in place otherwise they fall off. So it does make you take about five minutes just to yourself to be calm, COOL and collected.

So you effectively have to lay down while using these, because they dont stay on if you are upright, which makes them a huge pain. They are also very flat and straight and stiff - but your eye area is rounded. This makes it so they only touch one part of your under eyes(in the middle), if you want your whole under eye area to get the coolness, you have to hold it down. So to use these you have to be laying down and hold down both patches the whole time…. No thanks

rollup.name: Face Freezie Reusable Cooling Undereye Patches
